definition: servant/to employ sb for a job/to manage people/to be in need of staff
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Many employers also check whether potential hires can speak Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 許多用人單位也會覈查應聘者是否會講普通話。

sentences.english: Resulting systems will scale up to very large population.
sentences.chinese: 最終系統會擴展到很大的適用人羣。

sentences.english: Firstof all, you said Sun Jian and Sun Che's employment situation.
sentences.chinese: 首先說了一下孫堅和孫策的用人情況。

sentences.english: The employer may, on the basis of aforesaid regulation, terminate the labor contract.
sentences.chinese: 用人單位依據前述規定，均可以終止勞動合同。

sentences.english: The US should stop interfering in other country's internal affairs with human rights report.
sentences.chinese: 美國應停止用人權干涉其他國家的內政。

sentences.english: Dietary Guidelines recommendations traditionally have been intended for healthy Americans ages 2 years and older.
sentences.chinese: 美國膳食指南一般來說，適用人羣是2歲及以上。

sentences.english: Employers want to see quantifiable achievements.
sentences.chinese: 用人方想看到的是量化的成績。

sentences.english: It shall set up a roll of workers for reference.
sentences.chinese: 用人單位應當建立職工名冊備查。

sentences.english: An employer can only stipulate one probation period with a same worker.
sentences.chinese: 同一用人單位與同一勞動者只能約定一次試用期。

sentences.english: The employing units of no payment, from inside fund of inductrial injury insurance such payment.
sentences.chinese: 用人單位不支付的，從工傷保險基金中先行支付。

sentences.english: If employing units find it necessary to study the sick leave wage system, guidance must be provided.
sentences.chinese: 用人單位有必要研究病假工資制度，積極予以引導。

sentences.english: Competition for head nurse position starts a new system for nursery.
sentences.chinese: 護士長競爭上崗，掀開了護理用人制度新的一頁。

sentences.english: I learned a story about family business from my friends.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經聽朋友說一個家族企業的用人之道。

sentences.english: As soon as the employer ask for money, you can go without hovering.
sentences.chinese: 只要用人單位一說要你交錢，你掉頭就走便是了。

sentences.english: How did you grow up with new technology and employment?
sentences.chinese: 你們是如何通過新技術和用人發展的？

sentences.english: Sticking to use people appropriately will have influence on flourishing of our party's cause.
sentences.chinese: 堅持正確的用人導向關係到黨的事業興旺發達。

definition: expert at appointing people according to their abilities (idiom)/to put the right people in the right places
to appoint people according to their merits (idiom); appointment on the basis of ability and integrity
to appoint people by favoritism (idiom); nepotism/corrupt appointment
pragmatic/flexible/to act differently in different situations/to accommodate to circumstances
employ one's talent to the fullest/everyone gives of their best
to put in an important position
Easy to raise an army of one thousand, but hard to find a good general. (idiom)
pinyin: qian1 jun1 yi4 de2 , yi1 jiang4 nan2 qiu2
